text: Dominic Thiem was the defending champion, but chose to compete in Kitzbühel instead. Fabio Fognini won the title, defeating Andrej Martin in the final, 6–4, 6–1. ==Seeds== The top four seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== The top two seeds received a bye into the qualifying competition. ===Qualifiers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Croatia Open Umag - Singles 2016 Singles Category:2016 in Croatian sport
title: 2016 Croatia Open Umag – Singles
